member.returns: The requested type, or null if it could not be found.

member.name: M:ICSharpCode.WpfDesign.XamlDom.XamlTypeFinder.GetXmlNamespaceFor(System.Reflection.Assembly,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the XML namespace that can be used for the specified assembly/namespace combination.

member.name: M:ICSharpCode.WpfDesign.XamlDom.XamlTypeFinder.GetPrefixForXmlNamespace(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the prefix to use for the specified XML namespace, or null if no suitable prefix could be found.

member.name: M:ICSharpCode.WpfDesign.XamlDom.XamlTypeFinder.RegisterAssembly(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Registers XAML namespaces defined in the for lookup.

member.name: M:ICSharpCode.WpfDesign.XamlDom.XamlTypeFinder.RegisterFixNamespaces
member.summary: Register the Namspaces not found in any Assembly, but used by VS and Expression Blend

member.name: M:ICSharpCode.WpfDesign.XamlDom.XamlTypeFinder.LoadAssembly(System.String)
member.summary: Load the assembly with the specified name. You can override this method to implement custom assembly lookup.

member.name: M:ICSharpCode.WpfDesign.XamlDom.XamlTypeFinder.Clone
member.summary: Clones this XamlTypeFinder.

member.name: M:ICSharpCode.WpfDesign.XamlDom.XamlTypeFinder.ImportFrom(ICSharpCode.WpfDesign.XamlDom.XamlTypeFinder)
member.summary: Import information from another XamlTypeFinder. Use this if you override Clone().

member.name: M:ICSharpCode.WpfDesign.XamlDom.XamlTypeFinder.CreateWpfTypeFinder
member.summary: Creates a new XamlTypeFinder where the WPF namespaces are registered.
